title: First Look: The Scarab Cycles Paramo Integrated Steel Gravel Bike from Colombia
content:
The Scarab Paramo Integrated adds a slick, race-ready gravel option for the cable-haters, with a new Integrated Headset from Wolf Tooth, 700c x 48mm tire clearance and SRAM UDH

Read the full article at First Look: The Scarab Cycles Paramo Integrated Steel Gravel Bike from Colombia on Velo.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
